typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		eid as string,
		ename as string,
		did as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(country = upper(country),
		NewCountry = iif(isNull(country),'Unknown',country)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['derivedcolumnoutput'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
